mapper.select: SELECT ALARM_NO, EMAIL, ALARM_STATUS, ALARM_CONTENT, ALARM_ARRIVAL_TIME, ALARM_TITLE FROM ALARM WHERE EMAIL = #{email} OR EMAIL = 'gongji@web.com' ORDER BY ALARM_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ALARM (EMAIL, ALARM_STATUS, ALARM_CONTENT, ALARM_ARRIVAL_TIME, ALARM_TITLE) VALUES (#{email}, 1, #{content}, NOW(), #{title})
